database module¶

database.add_participant(name, grp_name)[source]¶

Add participants to a group

Args:
name (string): Username of participant grp_name (string): Name of group table.
database.available_users()[source]¶

Gets all user names signed up to the server

Returns:
list: list of usernames
database.change_clients_s1(a)[source]¶

Connects client information to server 1

Args:
a (int): changing load
database.change_clients_s2(a)[source]¶

Connects client information to server 2

Args:
a (int): changing load
database.check_status(name)[source]¶

Check online status of a user

Args:
name (string): Username for which status is checked
Returns:
int: 0 if offline, 1 if user is online
database.clients_s1()[source]¶

Gets all clients connected to server 1

Returns:
list: list of usernames of clients
database.clients_s2()[source]¶

Gets all clients connected to server 2

Returns:
list: list of usernames of clients
database.create_grp(grp_name)[source]¶

Create a new group table

Args:
grp_name (string): Name of group table.
database.create_table_newuser(name)[source]¶

Creates a new table for user chat history.

Args:
name (string): Username of user
database.find_user(l)[source]¶

This function checks whether a user’s details are already available in the database

Args:
l (list): Contains ID, Password user entered
Returns:
int: 0 for no user name,1 for wrong password,2 for succesfull login
database.get_all_names()[source]¶

To get all users from database

Returns:
list: List of all users signed up till now
database.get_participants(grp_name)[source]¶

Get participants of a group

Args:
grp_name (string): Name of group table.
Returns:
list: list of participants
database.grp_history(grpname)[source]¶

Gets history of a group

Args:
grp_name (string): Name of group table.
Returns:
list: list of tuples of encrypted unsent messages
database.grp_names()[source]¶

Gets all groups names

Returns:
list: list of group names
database.history_user(name)[source]¶

Gets history of a user

Args:
name (string): Username of the user
Returns:
list: list of tuples of encrypted unsent messages
database.insert_user(l)[source]¶

Inserts User Credentials to our Shared database.

Args:
l (list): Contains ID, Password and Public Key of user
database.members()[source]¶

Gets all user names signed up to the server

Returns:
list: list of usernames
database.no_of_msgs(name)[source]¶

Number of messages stored

Args:
name (string): Name of table
database.offline_msgs(name)[source]¶

Gets all offline messages stored

Args:
name (string): Username of user
Returns:
list: list of tuples of encrypted unsent messages
database.online_users()[source]¶

Gets available online users

Returns:
list: list of participants
database.recvPrivKey(n)[source]¶

Gets Private encryption of user

Args:
n (string): Username of user
Returns:
bytes: private key of user
database.recvPubKey(n)[source]¶

Gets Public encryption of user

Args:
n (string): Username of user
Returns:
bytes: public key of user
database.store_grp_chat(grp_name, name, msg)[source]¶

Stores group history

Args:
grp_name (string): Name of group table. name (string): Username of the user msg (bytes): Encrypted message
database.store_msg(name, sender, msg)[source]¶

Store message in the chat history

Args:
name (string): Username of user to whom message is to be sent sender (string): Username of user who sent the message msg (bytes): Encrypted message
database.store_offline_msg(name, sender, msg)[source]¶

Stores offline messages to be sent to the user

Args:
name (string): Username of user to whom message is to be sent sender (string): Username of user who sent the message msg (bytes): Encrypted message
database.update_chat_history(name)[source]¶

Deleting old chat records and adding new records

Args:
name (string): Name of table
Returns:
list: returns list of chat records
database.update_status(l)[source]¶

Update online status of a user

Args:
l (string): Username of user
